name: Address Book
description: In this project I used advanced Javascript concepts and ES6+ Features, persisting data using LocalStorage, testing with Cypress.

name: ATM
description: This project simulates an ATM where you can withdraw som $$$. It is written in Ruby and is tested with rspec.

name: FizzBuzz
description: This project is written in Ruby and tested using rspec. FizzBuzz checks if a number is equal and or dividable by five

name: Rock, Paper & Scissors
description: The good old Rock, Paper & Scissors. This application is written in React and tested with Cypress

name: The Portfolio Challange
description: Building my own Portfolio page to showcase my projects. Hint: You looking at it.

name: The Cooper Challenge
description: This is a fullstack project using Rails as backend and React as fronted.

name: The Slowfood Challenge
description: A first take on an App where a user can see a Menu and when logging in also place an order

name: The Midcourse Challenge
description: A user can see a list of movies and if the user signs up it can also search for films. If the user wants to become a paying member this is also possible

name: The newsroom Challenge
description: A newspaper that uses both geolocation as well stripe.
